Question: A tank initially contains \(765\) liters of water with a concentration of \(17\%\) sugar. A syrup with a sugar concentration of \(11\%\) is added to the tank at a rate of \(5\) liters per minute, and the well-mixed solution is drained from the tank at the same rate to maintain its volume. What will be the percentage of sugar in the solution after 9 minutes? Please give your answer to five significant figures.
